# [Interview #924: Brandon Sanderson's Blog: Worldbuilders, Tour Dates & Updates, Entry #2](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=924#2)

#### Brandon Sanderson

In this week's Writing Excuses podcast episode, Dan, Mary, Howard, and I talk about
[how to give your story's animals a personality](http://www.writingexcuses.com/2013/01/21/)
. Give it a listen.
